node.doctext:
This is the latest of the O'Reilly CD Bookshelves, and incorporates 6 O'Reilly titles in HTML format:

  • Running Linux, 3rd Edition
  • Linux in a Nutshell, 3rd Edition
  • CGI Programming with Perl, 2nd Edition
  • Apache: The Definitive Guide, 2nd Edition
  • MySQL and mSQL
  • Programming the Perl DBI
in addition to a soft-backed copy of Linux in a Nutshell.

Once again, O'Reilly have come up with a stunning collection of their books converted to searchable HTML, at a price far below the prices for the individual books.
node.itemdescription: 6 O'Reilly books on Apache, Perl, MySQL and Linux
node.usercomment: A quick review of the latest CD Bookshelf
node.title: Linux Web Server CD Bookshelf
